body:
Zhe,


I suspect line endings are causing your problem. Windows uses CR/LF as a
line ending. Unix uses LF. Often when a text file is created on Windows you
need to convert the line endings when those files are brought to Mac. Text
editors are usually fine with either, so it may not be noticeable when you
open the file in a text editor.


Here are some ways to do the conversion
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2613800/how-to-convert-dos-windows-newline-crlf-to-unix-newline-n-in-bash-script


Also, some text editors (such as Text Wrangler) allow you to set the line
endings when you do a save-as.


Andy
